face amount.translation[0].definitions[0: a sum of money paid to someone who has an insurance POLICY when that policy MATUREs (=it is time for it to be paid)
face amount.translation[0].definitions[1: the stated value of a share, bond etc when it is ISSUED (=sold for the first time). This is not necessarily the price that is really paid for it.
